import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unlink assets from parent"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/linked/to/{assetId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes parent-child relationships between assets so accessories or components are no longer linked to a parent device. Use this when retiring peripherals, reassigning accessories, or correcting an incorrect relationship.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Identify the parent asset via [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets).
2. **Child relationships** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/linked/to/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-linked-assets) to capture the linked asset IDs.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load the parent asset and list linked assets.
2. [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/linked/to/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/delete-linked-assets) with a `LinkedAssetListRequest` payload to remove the relationships.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId` (path) and child asset IDs in the request body.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the parent asset","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a parent-child relationship between two assets. Used to link accessories, peripherals, or components to a main asset.","properties":{"ParentAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the parent asset in the relationship"},"ChildAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the child asset being linked"},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time when the link was created"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional description of the relationship"}},"required":["ParentAssetId","ChildAssetId"],"title":"LinkedAsset"},"title":"LinkedAssetListRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
